name: PoliticalUpdate
0:
”Alexa, ask political update to tell me what's new”
”Alexa, ask political update to tell me about recent political news”
”Alexa, open political update”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: political update
des: Political update allows users to easily have Alexa give them a short update on any new political news. Updates come from a variety of reliable sources.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
